item.title: Selenium Grid setup using Docker-compose.yml
item.author: pawangaria@gmail.com (Pawan Garia)
item.description: In our last Article, we learned steps to create Selenium Grid using Docker. In our article, we used all the steps from the command line. Now there is a better way to setup Grid using docker-compose file. Using the Docker compose file It’s very easy to up and down and scale our grid by just running the File. #What is Docker-Compose File? Compose is a tool for defining and running multi-container Docker applications.
